embed.description: **Sheepopper** is a **Shade** that the player can summon by using the **Sheepopper Mask**. Sheepopper is summoned to a location on the enemy side of the board meaning that their effect of dealing damage when destroyed is applied to the player's enemies, as they are Sheepopper's allies.

fields.name: Effects
fields.value: When destroyed, deal 8 damage to allies in the row. **Summoned**
